attributes.action: fund all regional air ambulance and lifeboat/rescue services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe the RNLI and all regional air ambulance services, along with any other public rescue service, should come within the domain of government funding, rather than rely on public and charitable funding.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
